name: Mantyke
flavorText: A friendly Pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Mantine from your hand onto Mantyke (this counts as evolving Mantyke) and remove all damage counters from Mantyke.

attacks.name: Call for Friends
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Water Basic Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
